entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Ref returns/locals: Crash (& Debug.Asserts) in Inline Temp #8416
    Backlog
  • VB: inline a local updates code that should be left unchanged #18491
    Backlog
  • Suggest using of types in referenced Assembly #34642
    Backlog
  • Cleanup project only runs on one target framework #34419
    Backlog
  • Allow implementations of DocumentDiagnosticAnalyzer to return DiagnosticData #34360
    Backlog
  • Cancel button saves changes for Editing Naming Style options page #34215
    Backlog
  • Ensure workspace only returns document matches the content type of given text buffer #33439
    Backlog
  • Error List says that it has finished getting results, but analyzer's results haven't been populated #31850
    Backlog
  • Inline temporary variable messes up event registration for nested method #31300
    Backlog
  • Make `HostAnalysisScope` and its subtypes thread-safe #30458
    Backlog
  • Error List re-orders and scrolls after selecting one entry #30423
    Backlog
  • Public API design for IOptionWithGroup #30085
    Backlog
  • DeclareAsNullable fixer should trigger when assigning "maybe null" values to non-null variable #30110
    Backlog
  • Add tests to check tools|options pages against search keywords in VSPackage.resx file #29812
    Backlog
  • Avoid dependency on System.Collections.Immutable in AbstractConvertForEachToForCodeRefactoringProvider #29740
    Backlog
  • IDE analyzer/fixer test framework should always force enable analyzer rules by default #29615
    Backlog
  • Test devenv /build following vs-threading change #29284
    Backlog
  • Resolve inconsistent use of TestWorkspace.GetService<T> #29286
    Backlog
  • Intellisense partly assumes the wrong overload between Action<T> and Action<T1, T2> arguments #29493
    Backlog
  • VS doesn't automatically save modified additional document #29185
    Backlog
  • Editor Completion -- Properly support Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Completion.EnterKeyRule instead of having VB language check [working except After Fully Typed Word] #29220
    Backlog
  • Integration test failure: CSharpChangeSignatureDialog.VerifyReorderParameters/VerifyRemoveParameter "Failed to write to an IPC Port: The pipe is being closed." #29001
    Backlog
  • Typing fast with "Show completion list after a character is deleted" option [NEEDS BACKSPACE] #28796
    Backlog
  • Add Tests for product bug: VB Line Commit happening without the caret leaving the line #27988
    Backlog
  • Documentation missing for `IOption` #27358
    Backlog
  • Some refactoring doesn't respect naming rules #26417
    Backlog
  • we need test for EditorConfigDocumentOptionsProvider #26396
    Backlog
  • Create Integration test which cover VB snippet #25389
    Backlog
  • Enable and audit dispose rule suppressions in Roslyn.sln (CA2000 and CA2213) #25880
    Backlog
  • Ref returns/locals: Encapsulate Field - encapsulating fields used as ref returns causes attempt to illegally return ref property #8444
    Backlog
  • Change VB profile to enable "Warn if no user code on launch" by default #9383
    Backlog
  • testm Snippet doesn't automatically add a reference to Microsoft.VisualStudio.QualityTools.UnitTestFramework #12758
    Backlog
  • VB wrong codespit for a nested class that (so far) lacks End Class #3452
    Backlog
  • VB: When changing the type of a property, the type of it's setter should be updated automatically #3285
    Backlog
  • "Generate class" suggestion should prefer namespaces over classes for multiply-qualified names #4577
    Backlog
  • VB codespit for "Implement Interface" fails to add "Overloads" modifier where necessary #3238
    Backlog
  • Integration tests should correctly wait for workspace operations #33670
    Backlog
  • Nullability fixer for interface implementations #26833
    Backlog
  • Hint text for static string properties should show the static string #33218
    Backlog
  • In Quick Info, types in type parameter constraint clauses are not simplified #547
    Backlog
  • async completion: DebuggerTextView should not save topBuffer for the editor #31189
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense: double quote character should not be commit character #33636
    Backlog
  • workspace.WithDebuggerCompletionOptions should not be called in completion. Workspace should handle this internally #33337
    Backlog
  • Add a unit test for Async completion fails to scroll the caret into view #33861
    Backlog
  • Provide a unit test for "Restore original behavior of Shift+Enter during completion" #33863
    Backlog
  • provide a unit test for "Fix completion at the start of readonly documents" #33864
    Backlog
  • Completion should provide all in-scope type symbos #35060
    Backlog
  • Undo "restores" garbled code #34975
    Backlog
  • Allow Code Navigation to {} Patterns #34838
    Backlog
  • Intellisense misses internal LINQ variables available in Locals, Watch and Immediate windows #34780
    Backlog
  • FailFast in integration tests (ProjectId.ReadFrom) #33856
    Backlog
  • Move type service requires 0 length span #34643
    Backlog
  • Unit tests are needed for Code Cleanup #34420
    Backlog
  • Consolidate generated code checks for code fixes #34418
    Backlog
  • Review automated tests for formatting between ) and { #34399
    Backlog
  • Auto population of lambda expression for delegate assignment #34417
    Backlog
  • Peek Definition fails for UWP app #33085
    Backlog
  • Completion list after deletion breaks snippets flow #24377
    Backlog
  • Wrong region indenting in switch block #32104
    Backlog
  • Consider removing GCManager #34202
    Backlog
  • View in Object Browser Fails for Local Projet #34188
    Backlog
  • Expand complete statement tests to include formatting and completion variations #32126
    Backlog
  • VB cref to C# default property does not show up in find all references #7288
    Backlog
  • Consider removing IDocumentOperationsService.CanApplyChange #34011
    Backlog
  • Implement interface explicitly through #31818
    Backlog
  • Classifier for accessibility modifiers #32160
    Backlog
  • Caret position after undo is incorrect #33672
    Backlog
  • Autocompletion missing arguments #33630
    Backlog
  • Auto completion for goto and goto case #33215
    Backlog
  • Expose "Surround With" snippets as a refactoring #33693
    Backlog
  • Reenable the RenamingOpenFilesViaDTE test #30599
    Backlog
  • Race condition in SolutionExplorer_InProc.WaitForBuildToFinish #33597
    Backlog
  • CSharpAddImportCodeFixProvider crashes by unknown type #33497
    Backlog
  • Implement caching for parsed editorconfig values in the code style layer #33328
    Backlog
  • Suggestion: VB.NET lightbulb for removing setter bulk code #31101
    Backlog
  • 'Is Used By' navigation is broken in Solution Explorer #33087
    Backlog
  • Simplify foreach when converted to LINQ (query and method forms) #33037
    Backlog
  • do not search symbols in obj folder #32596
    Backlog
  • AbstractConvertConcatenationToInterpolatedStringRefactoringProvider.IsStringConcat Null Reference Info Bar #22324
    Backlog
  • C# console app, turn virtual space on #32837
    Backlog
  • Linked file with rooted path with '..' shows up in Miscellaneous Files #32730
    Backlog
  • Delete UnboundIdentifiersDiagnosticAnalyzer #32629
    Backlog
  • "Make field readonly" triggers on field of generic parameter type constrained to struct #32662
    Backlog
  • Allow use of AdhocWorkspace within custom debug visualizer #32568
    Backlog
  • Intellisense MRU precedence #16053
    Backlog
  • Workspace.TryApplyChanges(solution) does not apply RemoveMetadataReference. #12161
    Backlog
  • Completion window closes immediately when editing .cshtml files #9219
    Backlog
  • Project platform settings other than "Any CPU" are ignored #6535
    Backlog
  • Code fixes cannot change source encoding alone #4767
    Backlog
  • [caret placement] Add Braces #13490
    Backlog
  • [Test Failure] CSharpVenus - Generate Type Into App_Code Folder failed in windows_vsi_p3_open_prtest #14889 #14894
    Backlog
  • TextStructureNavigator doesn't recognize string literals #3203
    Backlog
  • "Change signature" refactoring moves non-argument tokens of multi-line method invocations #4128
    Backlog
  • BasicVenus.Script Block: Smart Indent On Moving out of current line #9671
    Backlog
  • Signature help doesn't agree on number of overloads when some are hidden via Browsable(false) #10197
    Backlog
  • Simplify Type Name on statics of derived types sometimes seems overly pedantic #12987
    Backlog
  • VB Signature help shows both static and instance overloads when invoked off type name. #13485
    Backlog
  • Formatting adds additional new line trivia to a pragma suppression fix #5793
    Backlog
  • ArgumentNullException thrown from CommandLineProject.CreateProjectInfo() #9499
    Backlog
  • Navigation bar in Visual Basic fully qualifies parents for nested types when it doesn't for other types #10238
    Backlog

Updated

  • Need to test various error scenarios for various flavors of ObjectCreationExpressionSyntax to ensure consistent IOperation tree shape #23572
    Backlog
  • 'Use pattern-matching' should be missing on writes from local function captures #29512
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: Convert lambda to local function #23310
    Backlog
  • Variable naming suggestions should prefer long form #20927
    Backlog
  • Reference highlighting doesn't work for some types from constructor expression #74803
  • Insert open paren after dotting off a close paren #20329
    Backlog
  • VB auto-completion on parameter names introduces duplicate := #17730
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Change nodes to reduce compute logic #75563
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Fix primary ctor param in static context #74580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Restrict some types in object initializer setters when not directly settable #75507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Revise expression parsing #75553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Improve performance on `SymbolCompletionProviderTests` #75496
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Ensure that `GetSymbolInfo` returns only constructor symbols for object creation expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Prefer Cancel() rather than Commit() when rename is async. #75562
    Area-IDE, untriaged
